title: Most troll League champions
body: Please list the most troll champions you can think of and why you think they are troll

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=JonahGreen,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=t5AgebYe,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-29T03:13:44.688+0000)
>
> why?

Because he is legit a troll :D

because he is a troll?
also he can interupt allied recalls with his pillar i think
Anivia, u can bait ur teammate to do drag then wall them inside the pit for them to die... also cancel bs and tps
singed, farm behind enemy towers then get ganked, instead of dying, fling the ganker and run with insanity potion and ghost 500+ movespeed

I think Shaco not teemo because the surprise ganks earlier game WILL mess up your team late game also if he is feed the damage output will rekt your team. His clone doesn't help is he can use it in combat and escapes so yeah. If you have played with a Shaco you know what i am talking about. Although if the player doesn't know how to play Shaco very well it's pretty easy to kill the Shaco {{champion:35}}

Lee is blind, yet can see shaco although all the other champs cant... 
Rito=NA Logic
Me=KR Logic
